comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content:
A beautiful and iconic photograph.
Expertly & professionally lit, exposed, focussed, framed and composed.
And personalised by the message and signature of the pioneer pilot himself.
A picture that is very much worthy of the San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive.

comment.author: 87381685@N05
comment._content: I have several photos of Lindbergh that seem to be originals. One is of him and his aide being greated in the CZ. One of him , a close up, in The Spirit of St. Louis. Does anyone know if they are of any value?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/87381685@N05] They could be of some value if they are originals and they have not been reprinted and widely viewed...
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
